ThingDef.label: demon tentacles
ThingDef.description: A severed demon tentacle. Long and flexible, constantly leaking demonic fluids. Useless for humans.

ThingDef.label: demon penis
ThingDef.description: A severed demon penis. It's average humanlike size, constantly leaking demonic fluids. Useless for humans.

ThingDef.label: demon vagina
ThingDef.description: A severed demon vagina, full of small tentacles, constantly leaking demonic fluids. Useless for humans.

ThingDef.label: demon anus
ThingDef.description: A severed demon anus... full of tentacles. Useless for humans.
